config.name: IsSimulatorMode
config.description: 是否启用模拟环境模式

config.name: IsServiceControlMode
config.description: 是否启用工程师控制模式

config.name: CrossAlignTransfer
config.description: Aligner上有片时是否允许晶圆从上方传输

config.name: DiskFreeSpaceAlarmTolerance
config.description: 磁盘剩余空间报警阈值

config.name: MonitoredDriveLetter
config.description: 需要被监控剩余空间的盘符。规则:C表示C盘;CD表示C盘和D盘...

config.name: ProcessAlarmEnable
config.description: 是否启用所有process相关的报警

config.name: WaferCountBelowWhichStartNewProcessJob
config.description: 未处理晶圆数量低于此数值开启后续任务

config.name: VCEAutoVentAfterJobDone
config.description: 自动模式下Vce是否在完成任务后Vent

config.name: VCEProcessRateEnable
config.description: 是否启用不同VCE的处理比率

config.name: MaxProcessWaferCount
config.description: 同时处理的晶圆数量，数值不能大于已安装Chamber数量

config.value: System.IsAlarm=System in alarm status;System.IsIdle=System in idle status
config.name: Trigger
Value
config.description: 设置灯塔触发的逻辑关系

config.name: DelayTime
config.description: Step Delay time before collection data

config.name: BuzzerTimeWhenJobDone
config.description: buzzer time after job done, -1=never stop, 0=silent,xxx=buzzer time

config.name: EnablePopDialogWhenJobDone
config.description: Whether pop window after job done

config.name: AtmPressureBase
config.description: 判断大气压的时候，压力值需要大于该值

config.name: VacuumPressureBase
config.description: 判断真空的时候，压力值需要小于该值

config.name: PlatformOutAfterUnload
config.description: VCE在卸载晶圆时平台自动转出

config.name: PressureGaugeRange
config.description: 压力计测量范围最大值

config.name: PressureIOReverse
config.description: 是否是IO值越大压力值越小

config.name: VacuumPressureBase
config.description: 判断真空的时候，压力值需要小于该值

config.name: ForelinePressureBase
config.description: 抽气的时候，Foreline压力值需要小于该值

config.name: WaitForelinePressureTimeout
config.description: 抽气的时候，foreline压力多久达不到底压，则报错

config.name: PumpDelayTime
config.description: 抽气到底压后，继续抽气多长时间

config.name: VentDelayTime
config.description: 充气到大气压后，继续充气多长时间

config.name: UpperLimitOfChamberPressureForLeakageMonitoring
config.description: 检测漏率的最高目标压力值

config.name: PumpDelayTime
config.description: 测漏开始后，继续抽气多长时间

config.name: LeakCheckDelayTime
config.description: 开始检测漏率的延迟时间

config.name: MaxPressureDiffOpenSlitValve
config.description: 闸板阀允许打开的最大压力差

config.name: PickDelay
config.description: Pick时检测到Pin信号时延迟伸展时间

config.description: Place时检测到Pin信号时延迟回缩时间
